Battle your way through a variety of rivals across multiple arcades as the story unfolds, all while mastering the basics and practical skills in TEKKEN 8. Unlock a variety of customization items for characters and avatars as you progress.

*In addition to this edition, Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition are also available. Please be careful not to purchase the same content twice.

item.title: UNDERDOGS
item.description:
About This Game



Wrap yourself in 5 tons of metal and go smashing through a dark scene of UNDERGROUND MECH FIGHTS! Bash, crush, maul and rip apart enemy bots and mechs.

IT’S FULL-ON METAL-ON-METAL VIOLENCE IN THIS PHYSICS-BASED MECH BRAWLER!



But rampaging through the pits ain’t all - THIS IS A ROGUELIKE.
Gear up with 120+ items including power tools to customize your mech, meet 30+ characters, hire hackers and saboteurs, hustle and deal with the gangsters and psychos who run these streets as you claw your way up the food chain.



This city is a dog-eat-dog shit show, but luckily you ain't alone.
Your little bruv King is in your corner - calling out threats and giving you lip while you fight like a wild animal, smashing car sized pit bots that wanna kill you dead to the deafening roars of the blood thirsty crowds.

This is New Brakka - The Mech Fighting Capital of the World.
This is UNDERDOGS.

Welcome to the jungle.

item.title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
item.description:
About This Game



EPIC EMOTIONAL DRAMA
Two larger-than-life heroes brought together by the hand of fate, or perhaps something more sinister…

Ichiban Kasuga, an unstoppable underdog who’s no stranger to crawling up from rock bottom, and Kazuma Kiryu, a broken man facing down his last days.



BEST-IN-CLASS RPG ACTION
Experience one-of-a-kind combat with dynamic, fast-paced RPG battles where the battlefield becomes your weapon, and anything goes. Adapt your party’s skills to the situation with outlandish jobs and customizations to strategically subdue enemies with over-the-top moves.



INFINITE ADVENTURE
Live it up in Japan and explore all that Hawaii has to offer in an adventure so big it spans the Pacific. Unforgettable moments await at every step of the journey with a unique mix of quests and activities to enjoy at your leisure.



Deluxe Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more

Ultimate Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more
- Assorted Outfit Bundle: Customize your party's look with outfits & swimwear
- Sujimon & Resort Bundle: Get legendary Sujimon, resort guests and special boosters
- Yakuza CD Collection Set: Increase your in-game playlist with classic karaoke tracks

item.title: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
item.description:
About This Game



Apollo Justice's Legal Journey Begins Anew!

Join rookie attorney Apollo Justice and his mentor, the legendary Phoenix Wright, in this collection of 3 games! This title features the 14 episodes of "Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney", "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies", and "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Spirit of Justice", and the 2 previously DLC-only Special Episodes for a total of 16 episodes!

Also included is a mountain of extra goodies that's sure to satisfy any Ace Attorney fan!

Orchestra Hall - Listen to the in-game background music and select orchestral arrangements!

Art Library - View illustrations, design specs, commissioned pieces, and even the special Spirit of Justice Prologue anime!

Animation Studio - Play around with character animations and recreate your favorite scenes!

This collection supports Japanese, English, French, German, Korean, and Traditional and Simplified Chinese. Mix and match to play in whichever languages you'd like!

Immerse yourself in this beautiful collection as you shout "Objection!" in these newly renovated halls of justice!

Some of the contents of the games in this collection are presented as initially released to preserve the games as originally created.

item.title: Summon Masters
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card and board game with the following features:

Deck Building: Players can build their own decks to battle with. Depending on different strategies and opponents, players can choose different cards to counter.

Tactical Gameplay: The game uses a 3x10 chessboard, and players can freely place cards to fight. Players need to develop tactics and arrange card positions and usage order within limited space.

Different Professions: Players can choose freely from four professions - swordsman, mage, monk, and archer. Each profession has different characteristics and skills, and players can choose according to their preferences and tactical needs.

Competitive Battles: Players can battle with other players after building their decks, and it is fun to fight with other people. Through battles with other players, players can improve their strength and tactical skills.

Team Dungeons: In addition to fighting against other players, players can also team up with others to challenge high-difficulty dungeons. Players need to defeat powerful bosses through cooperation and strategy to get more rewards and cards.

Special Challenges: Players can participate in special rules challenges and use their intelligence to defeat other players. These special rules make the game more interesting and challenging, and players need to constantly think and try new strategies.

Fast-paced: Each game is fast-paced (within 5 minutes), and can be played in short fragments of time. The fast pace of the game allows players to enjoy the game in a short time, while also being able to play at any time and anywhere.

item.title: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

Take the helm of a classic Russian locomotive, discover the raw beauty and wildness of Siberia and try to survive on the longest railway line in the world. This is the Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator. A game for real adventurers!



Complete the tutorial and the first kilometers of the route for free.



The Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator offers amazing rail and survival challenges on real Russian dangerous routes. Feel what it is like to put your hands at the helm of a powerful freight locomotive and explore the untouched natural landscape that is sure to delight you.

Prologue features:

  • Detailed simulation of driving a VL10 locomotive - the locomotive control is slightly simplified.
  • Locomotive repair system - Manage and replace locomotive parts that are constantly wearing out.
  • Train traffic simulation - Follow rail signs and signals to avoid derailment or damage to a part of the locomotive.
  • Work system - Earn by completing transport orders.
  • Game modes (Survival) and (Simulator). It is recommended to play in the (Survival) mode. This is the leading game mode that is constantly being developed.
    For players who are not interested in survival mechanics, a simple Simulator mode is available.
  • Mafia system - Complete missions for the mafia to earn extra money.
  • Survival system with statistics of hunger, thirst, alcohol, hangover, disease and hypothermia - Eat and drink to avoid death.
    Keep the right temperature so you don't freeze.
  • Shooting system - Use your weapons for hunting and self-defense.
  • Purchase and sales system - Buy various items, food, tools, weapons and ammunition.
  • Locomotive inspection mode - Inspect the condition of locomotive parts and replace them in time to avoid damage.
  • Dynamic weather system with day and night cycle - Survive extreme weather conditions.
  • Route from (Novosibirsk-West) to (Novosibirsk-Main) - scale 1:1. Buy the full version with the route from (Novosibirsk-West) to (Krasnoyarsk).
  • Police system - A corrupt militia watches over your movements.
  • Much more to discover.

item.title: The Universim
item.description:
About This Game

WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH THE POWER?

🔵Play God!

Guide your fledgling sentient species (lovingly called “nuggets”) from Stone Age cave painters to star-faring explorers.

🔵Wield godly power

Command more than 15 godly powers to guide, protect — or discipline — your followers. Create devastating tornadoes, smite naughty followers with lightning bolts, or shake and sunder the very earth.

🔵Watch your Nuggets grow and thrive

Observe Nuggets' every move as they work and fight to survive.

🔵Evolve and advance through the ages

Research more than 200 technological and societal advancements.

🔵Expand your power and colonize the galaxy

Discover and colonize a galaxy of procedurally generated planets, each with unique ecosystems and challenges to conquer.

🔵Manage delicate ecosystems

Manage the delicate balance of planetary ecosystems to help nuggets thrive. Your decisions and your followers’ ' actions influence global climates and have real environmental consequences. (Try not to kill them in an ecological disaster — well, unless you want to, of course.)

🔵Delve into the deeper mystery of your existence

Unravel the layers of a deeper cosmic story that challenges your perception of who and what you are — and reveals unexpected twists!

About This Game:


The Universim is a strategy city builder game with “God” elements where you guide a civilization (Nuggets) from the Stone Age to the Space Age. Manage resources, dynamic challenges, and ensure your Nuggets can survive, thrive, and spread to the stars.



The Universim features more than 200 research perks that will help you to shape your civilization. Be as benevolent or malevolent as you like to drive nuggets to evolve, advance, and expand. (Even the best civilizations need an occasional smiting).
Every planet in The Universim is procedurally generated and offers unique characteristics and challenges, ensuring that every world and every game is unique and engaging. Ecological balance and resource management are critical to success. Nuggets have their own needs and behaviors you must attend to. Your guidance will shape how they deal with conflicts, natural disasters, alien creatures, and other civilizations. Their growth and evolution depends on you!








This game published by Crytivo

item.title: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608270/Intravenous_2/


Step into the shoes of Gideon, a ruthless mercenary who cares about nothing but his wealth. Set two months before the events of Intravenous 2, you will take on seemingly simple jobs, the effects of which will ripple out and affect the main game's protagonist. But why should Gideon care? He's just in it for the money.

Key Features


  • Stealth or Firepower: the choice is yours. Sneak through shadows, turn off the lights, pick doors, or unleash a hail of bullets. The game will adapt to your play style.
  • Customize Your Skills: develop your skills the way you want to, whether it's mastering the art of stealth or becoming a gunslinging virtuoso.
  • Bullet Time: Gideon is no stranger to stimulants that enhance his cognitive abilities - bending time to give him the edge in tense situations.
  • Vast Arsenal: choose from firearms, gadgets, and a variety of ammo types to creatively tackle the challenge
  • Weapon Modification: personalize each firearm with suppressors, laser sights, and more, tailoring your arsenal to the task at hand.
  • Responsive AI: engage in intense combat with enemies that react to your actions, take cover, use tactics and call for backup.

item.title: Turnip Boy Robs a Bank
item.description:
About This Game



Turnip Boy is ready to commit more felonies in this comedic action-adventure game with roguelite elements. This time the career criminal is teaming up with the fearsome Pickled Gang to plan and execute the weirdest heist of all time! Shake down hostages, steal precious valuables, and explore the deep, dark depths and history of the Botanical Bank.

To pull off the perfect heist, you’ll need to purchase an array of dangerous and wacky tools from the dark web, including a diamond pickaxe, C4, and… a cardboard box? However, bank robbing isn’t easy, so be prepared for intense shootouts with security guards, the fuzz, elite swat teams and more!



  • A thrilling single-player adventure full of bank robbing, dark web browsing, and fuzz fighting.
  • Roguelite elements to turnip the action.
  • A big ol’ bank to explore and loot.
  • An array of wacky weapons.
  • Take on whoever the bank throws at you in intense shootouts, from security guards to elite veggie swat teams!
  • A large cast of quirky food-based characters, including some familiar faces and new citizens with their own stories and problems.
  • Earn collectable hats to wear and new banger tracks to blast.
  • Discover a deeper history of Turnip Boy’s world and how it became what it is.

item.title: Dominions 6 - Rise of the Pantokrator
item.description:
About This Game

You are a God! You are master and ruler of a loyal nation. You have unimaginable powers at your disposal. You have claimed this world as yours. But there are others who stand in your way. You must defeat and destroy these pretenders. Only then can you ascend to godhood and become the new Pantokrator.

Dominions 6 is a turn based 4x strategy game suitable for both play vs AI, player vs player. Team play vs AI or players also works great as everyone can do their turns at once. The game has a huge variety of units, spells, magic items and different nations to play.

In Dominions you take control of a powerful being that rules a nation and aspires to godhood. The type of Pretender Gods can vary from magically powerful arch mages to huge titans or large monuments. The pretender gods have different strengths dependent on what kind of god you choose and what nation you play.

When you start the game you decide what kind of god you are and how your Dominion affects your lands, followers and sacred soldiers. It is an expression of your divine might and the faith of your followers. If your dominion dies, so do you. Your dominion also inspires your sacred warriors and gives them powers derived from your dominion.

In order to win and become the one true god you have to defeat your enemies one of three different ways: conquer their lands, extinguish their dominion or claim the Thrones of Ascension.

Dominions is set in a fantasy world that draws inspiration from historical nations, cultures and myths. You will not encounter the elves of conventional fantasy in this game. Instead you might lead a nation of vanir from old norse myth. Aztecs, romans, israelites, greeks, kievian rus and lovecraftian horrors are just a few of the inspirational sources of the game.

The first Dominions game was released in 2002 and was well received by strategy gamers. Since then Dominions has been much refined and Dominions series is still actively played making it one of the longest running 4x turn based strategy games.

----------

Dominions 6 is scaled up compared to Dominions 5 and armies are larger. We wanted to tweak the balance between conventional armies and magic. To accomplish this a couple of changes are introduced. Incomes and resources are increased, while mages are more expensive. Battlefield-wide spells are more difficult to cast and there are instead more mid-tier spells. There are some other changes with the same aim.

The second and probably most influential change is the addition of a new magic path. No longer are illusions the domain of Air magic. Instead illusions, phantasms, dreams and the stuff of forgotten legends are manipulated with the path of Glamour. This has resulted in many new spells, items and sites being added to the game.

A third massive change is the separation of mounts and riders. Riders and mounts now have separate stats and can be targeted individually. This change probably has less impact on gameplay than the previous one, but will still have an impact on cavalry and nations using mounted units.

Dominions 6 features a number of new nations as well. The addition of the Glamour path has also affected several of the old nations.

There are also a number of changes intended to ease gameplay.

item.title: Home Safety Hotline
item.description:
About This Game





Hearing noises? Seeing things? Call Home Safety Hotline! Our operators are standing by, waiting to give you the answers you need to protect your home from all manner of pests and household hazards.

Home Safety Hotline is an analog horror inspired telephone operator simulator where you answer incoming callers' questions about what's inside their home. Read through a vast catalog of common pests and household hazards, and do your best to become an expert in home safety. You will be held responsible for what happens.

A new horror experiment from Nick Lives, the creator of NiGHT SIGNAL and A Wonderful Day For Fishing.

  • Navigate a vast catalog of safety information using the latest in 90's technology.
  • Listen to original jazzy lo-fi music by David Johnsen while you place callers on hold.
  • Correctly deduce what's in your callers' homes or else leave them to suffer the consequences.
  • Learn about the various untold horrors that live inside your home.
  • "Phobia Toggles" - An accessibility option that allows you to disable in-game images for common phobia triggers including arachnophobia and more.
  • Unlockable Art Book detailing the game's development history.

item.title: Artifact Seeker:Prologue
item.description:
About This Game


The difference between the prologue version and the official version
There is a special artifact in the prologue
Characters: 2 in the prologue, at least 5 in the official version
Maps: 2 in the prologue, 3 in the final version.
Systems: Tavern, Marketplace, and Endless Mode will be added to the game.
Artifacts: More artifacts will be added to the game.
Skills: More skills will be added in the official version.
Affixes: More Affixes will be added in the official version.
Events: There will be more interesting Events in the official version.
Progress: No need to worry, all progress will be carry into the official version.


Artifact Seeker is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game. A game of gods, with Aurorium as the board, And all the mortals as their pawns and swords. You can obtain artifacts by slaying corrupted enemies, collecting gold to exchange it for artifacts at mysterious merchants. How to use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods? to end the game of gods or to become a god yourself. Artifact Seeker, Your choice.



Dozens of evolvable skills, extreme sprint dash, and the ultimate special skill to slay enemies!



Intense paced battles, you can buy artifacts to boost your power after each battle!



Hundreds of different artifacts with matching skills to create a wide variety of bond Synergy, and utilize the power of the synergy to challenge higher level enemies! [/b]



RPG like Events, diverse choices, adventuring dungeons, exploring magical worlds, befriend different heroes and unlock new characters!



Hundreds of affixes and attributes, dozens of different meta-progressions, weapon unlocking and strengthening, and sharing your own unique artifacts with your pals! There's new contents to experience after every run!



Explore the world and discover the hidden secrets behind the story!

item.title: Frostrain
item.description:
About This Game

Roam the frozen world


Climate change has turned the world white and frozen, and the only thing moving on the planet is you, your passengers, and your train. It's a dead world, but ironically, it's all the more fascinating for it. A vivid landscape awaits you to explore.

Keep your passengers happy


The passengers on your train will work diligently at your command, but be careful: if you don't manage their happiness properly, they might throw you off the train.

Build your own train with card decks


Each time you pass through a city, you'll be able to add new train cars by launching a heavy lift drone. Be careful with each choice you make. If you are lucky, you'll be able to build a better, more synergized, happily-ever-after train deck, but it won't always go as you planned.

Reach the Promised Land


Lead your passengers in search of the Promised Land, somewhere on the eastern edge of the world. But the journey to the Promised Land isn't all smooth and pleasant. You'll have to pass through toxic areas, and a severe storm is brewing behind you. Pay attention to your passengers' happiness levels and lead them safely to the Promised Land. The journey is in your hands.

item.title: Nothing
item.description:
About This Game

The hardest game you're ever going to play. Or is it?

Just do Nothing as the timer goes up. If you do Something, you lose.

If you don't like doing Nothing, go play Something instead.

item.title: KinitoPET
item.description:
About This Game

Join the Discord!

https://discord.gg/GZfJqdM7au

Enter the Everlasting Fun!

Would you like a friend? Yes? Well, I have something special for you.

KinitoPET invites you to their wonderfull world of fun and excitement!
Where he will be your very own virtual friend and personal helper! 


Kinito is able to walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games as Kinito is like no other with its adaptive technology! Kinito is h̶i̶d̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶a̶ ̶d̶a̶r̶k̶ ̶s̶e̶c̶r̶e̶t a friend you'll never forget with its critically acclaimed react respond algorithm to make your experience in̶d̶e̶f̶i̶n̶i̶t̶e truly unique. Where d̶i̶d̶ he ̶g̶o else can you find a friend like Kinito with its multitude of great features and friendly love!

Kinito will be your friend and you can s̶t̶o̶p̶ ̶i̶t be there's!
So why wait as with your new virtual assistant and friend you can have f̶o̶r̶e̶v̶e̶r everlasting fun!

item.title: Summoners War
item.description:
About This Game

▶Features
[Tactical RPG play]
Witness the dazzling display of each monster 's unique skills.
23 different Rune sets to pick and choose additional abilities for your monsters!
Come up with the best strategy to win battles in the Sky Arena .

[Endless Fun]
Decorate your Village, battle other summoners , explore dungeons , fight in PvP battles , expand your collection, train monsters , and more.

[The Key of Colletion RPG : Massive Collection]
Fire, Water, Wind, Light and Dark!
5 different attributes, and 1500 different monsters!
Collect as many monsters as you can and win battles with your own decks .

[Real-time Raid]
Battle as a team with your greatest monsters !
A real-time battle with 3 users!
Defeat the boss with your fellow Summoners using various tactics.

[Homunculus]
The Forbidden Summoning Magic has finally been revealed!
You can Evolve the skill of your choice with this special monster.
Summon Homunculus and show off your strategy in the Sky Arena .

[All about Turn-Based RPG : World Arena]
Enjoy a real-time battle with Summoners worldwide!
Experience a breathtaking battle that starts from Pick & Ban.
Reveal your unique strategy to the world and win battles .

[Guild Content]
A sensational Guild PvP battle in the Isle of Conquest!
Explore the Tartarus' Labyrinth and dungeons with Guild Members.
Make your Guild the greatest of all.

[Dimension Hole]
Fight against the ancient power emerged from a new dimension!
Defeat the Ancient Guardians and meet the powerful monsters with new awakening power.

[Artifact]
Artifacts are now dropped with MAX power-up levels!
Summoners , fight against the powerful bosses and acquire Artifacts!
Enhance your monsters with various sub properties of Artifacts.

[Progression and Farming Structure Revamp]
Summoner progression structure renewed and content reward greatly improved!
Dive into Summoners War and experience the enhanced progression system!

item.title: Portal: Revolution
item.description:
About This Game

Portal: Revolution is a fan-made mod for Portal 2 which plays before the events of Portal 2 in the dead and decaying Aperture facility.


Over 40 new puzzles
The campaign contains 40 brand new puzzles making use of new test elements and presents existing mechanics in a new way not seen in Portal 2.

  • Resurrected "Pneumatic Diversity Vent" element
  • New laser cube variant
  • Over 15 puzzles using only the blue Portal-Gun
  • Gel Cleansing Field

Difficulty
Portal: Revolutions puzzle difficulty starts where Portal 2 stops, but fear not. All new mechanics and advanced portal tricks are taught to you. We have ensured through rigorous playtesting that every player can solve the puzzles. Although very few chambers require portals to be fired mid-air, no puzzles require advanced tricky movement.

Depending on your experience with Portal 2 mechanics, you can expect about 5 to 7 hours of playtime.


Set inbetween Portal and Portal 2, Portal: Revolution tells a brand new story using new characters. You play as a test subject who is awoken by a personality sphere called Stirling and join his mission to find a powerful device capable of restoring Aperture to its former glory.

ENGINE

Portal: Revolution uses a modified version of Portal 2: Community Edition's engine, which is a custom version of the Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Source Engine branch using licensed source code provided by Valve Software.

This allowed us to introduce many mechanics and improvements to the engine to create an experience which would be impossible in Portal 2.

item.title: The Lancaster Leak - Entity Exam
item.description:
About This Game

Episode 3 - Entity Exam

The whistle-blowers have kept their promise and have leaked another tape. It seems to be some sort of training protocol used by the E.R.D. to train their agents on not only entities but field skills to improve their chances of survival.

WARNING: This game is not suitable for children or those easily disturbed

Multiple Modules


There are 6 sections to prepare you for the final exam. Learn and practice the skills that cover this text, image, and audio-based game.

Features

  • 30-40 minutes long
  • Linear Story
  • Minor Jumpscares

Playing the other games is recommended but not required.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2356440/The_Lancaster_Leak__OBrien_State_Park/ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2519560/The_Lancaster_Leak__Crisis_At_Call_Center/

item.title: Solar Serpent Squadron
item.description:
About This Game

Solar Serpent Squadron is a survivor bullet heaven game with snake-like movement. You will build your snake "body" as weapons, and destroy hundreds of enemies swarm coming right at you!

Embark on a Cosmic Odyssey! 🚀

Welcome to the endless void of space in Solar Serpent Squadron, where survival hinges on quick thinking and strategic maneuvering. Your mission: pilot a unique, ever-evolving serpent-like spaceship through relentless battles against a continuous onslaught of enemies.

Simple Yet Addictive 🕹️

- Endless Space Combat: Dive into non-stop action with a game that's easy to pick up but challenging to master.
- Evolving Serpent Craft: Each enemy destroyed gives you chance to power-up your snake with new segments, each gives distinct abilities and tactical advantages.
- Strategic Diversity: Your choices in upgrades craft your path to survival. Offense, defense, or a nuanced balance — the strategy is yours to define.
- Scaling Challenges: The longer you survive, the more intense the battle becomes. Embrace the escalating difficulty for even greater rewards.

item.title: MY ANIMA BOY
item.description:
About This Game

No Choices. No Mini-Games. No Multiple Endings.

All you can do is choose the places to visit and read through a fantasy romance story that concludes in about an hour.

"Is this even a game?" "I dunno."

But, their story will gently warm your heart a little.

One more thing. The story really sticks to the music and lyrics.

Features

  • Short Story (1-3 hours)
  • Achievements
  • Unique Graphics
  • Ending Theme with Song

The Story

In the military state of Melkid Defensive Nation, which has been waging war with monsters for centuries, the court orchestra "Screw Heads", although a symphonic band, is ordered to create a 'pop song with love as its theme'.
The protagonist and composer, Paolo, struggles with the unfamiliar task of writing lyrics, when suddenly, the beautiful young member Tiyakins becomes inexplicably angry...

A short BL novel that weaves elements of war and sexuality into a commoner's story of creating their first pop song.

item.title: Building Block Cities - Fire Copter Drills
item.description:
About This Game

This game includes two major parts: building a city scene using the given building blocks and finishing fire copter drills on the scene. Initially, an example city scene is included in the game. Players can build their own city scenes by editing this example. The building blocks can be assembled by matching color-coded faces on the blocks. Waypoint gates (also a type of the given building blocks) should be included in a city scene, and these gates can be connected to form a closed loop. This loop is for fire copter drills just like racetracks are for car races. A drill is finished after the fire copter flies through all waypoint gates (three laps of the loop).

item.title: Brownie's Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

A fantasy point and click adventure in traditional 1990s style. Dark humour, player choices that have some impact on your outcome and hours of daft shenanigans.

- Over 70 locations
- Thousands of lines of dialogue
- Over 120 custom made sound effects
- Original composed soundtrack
- Alternate outcomes and wildly varying dialogue based on player choice



In this hilarious parody adventure set in a vaguely renaissance fantasy world you play as 'Brownie'. Brownie is a sub manager of a local pilchard press in his home town of Schtinkberg. A simple man, in the midst of a mid life crisis. He awakes from a terrible dream featuring his permanently angry boss and a poorly animated unicorn... the rest is up to you.


Follow the twists and turns of Brownie's adventure into our world (Well, Sheffield anyway) and beyond in the funniest and most ridiculous point and click to ever be solo developed by a middle aged hippy burnout. Hours of puzzles and laughs.

Make choices, solve puzzles and enjoy absurd dialogue. Remember: You will be judged!

item.title: Cthulhu tower
item.description:
About This Game

In Cthulhu Tower, you will plunge into the depths of cosmic horror as you defend the eldritch abominations led by the ancient entity against the relentless onslaught of humanity. This is a tower-defense game that takes a spine-tingling twist on the genre, casting you as the protector of the Great Old Ones in a battle that will test your strategic prowess and your sanity.

  • Eldritch Forces: Control Lovecraftian monstrosities with unique abilities.
  • Sanity Challenge: Protect your sanity amidst the human onslaught.
  • Crafting and Building: Utilize a robust crafting system to create tools, weapons, and structures to improve your chances of survival.
  • Dynamic Day-Night Cycle: Adapt to the changing environment as day turns into night, presenting new threats and opportunities.
  • Resource Management: Gather resources from the environment, including flora, fauna, and minerals, to sustain your needs and craft essential items.
  • Grim Aesthetics: Haunting visuals and eerie soundtrack.
  • Endless Mode: Test your endurance against relentless waves.

item.title: SprintLine
item.description:
About This Game

SprintLine: A Test of Skill and Patience

Dive into SprintLine, a 3D speed-running platformer designed to challenge and frustrate. Navigate through a labyrinth of obstacles with options to sprint, jump, or wallride. Every level is a new puzzle, testing your reflexes and resolve.

Simple in concept but complex in execution, SprintLine is not just about finishing the course; it's about mastering it. Respawn points are your lifelines, sparingly scattered to keep you sane. Expect hours of gameplay filled with exhilarating highs and testing lows.

Perfect for those who love a tough gaming challenge, SprintLine promises not just a sense of achievement, but a journey of perseverance and grit. Are you ready to take on the challenge?"

item.title: Party PooperZ
item.description:
About This Game

About this game
Party Pooperz is an awesome chaotic party game, where you compete against your friends. The fate of tonight’s party theme rests on your shoulders, steal guests and use items to make your party the most popular. Let the battle for the most legendary party begin!

Donna, Matt, John and Molly live together and have decided to throw an epic party, one that their friends will remember forever. However, there’s a slight problem - they can’t settle on the music genre for the party. They have a really big fight about what’s the coolest choice. Is Donna correct with her preference for disco, or perhaps Molly, who’s a big fan of DnB, is onto something? Or could John be right, and jazz is the way to go?

In this game, you and your friends get to decide the best music genre together! Settle the battle by hosting competing parties in the same room at the same time. Use a pizza item to lure party guests to your party, or throw a bottle to make your friend a little dizzy ;). Or… you can simply throw the party guests to your party and just force them into liking your party! Can you ‘throw’ the biggest party?

Pick Up and Play
This game is designed for everyone to enjoy. You only need to use two buttons: a button to move and a button to throw party people, pick up, and use items! This way, even people who don't often play games can join in.

Choose Your Music Genre
Party Pooperz is a game that explores the question of the best music genre. What music genres do your friends like? Disco, hip hop, jazz, or something wilder? Choose your favorite and throw the best party!



Throw a party by throwing people!
In this game, you can throw people to your party and let others see which party they would enjoy the most.



Whack-a-Friend
In Party Pooperz, it's not just about partying – it's about a good-natured brawl! Got a buddy you're dying to give a playful wallop? Wield a guitar or a candy stick and spread some party cheer right across their noggin.

Use Items
Sabotage other players using various items.

Use a matras to defend yourself from other players. Be strategic to make the most of this item!

What's a party without pizza? Use the pizza item to attract people to your party.

Make other players too dizzy to control their movements with the bottle item. Throw it at other players to use it.

Use the water pistol to shoot away other players from your party or to bring party people to your party.

Put on some good shoes and dance all night long. These shoes make you move a lot quicker!

item.title: Friendly Snowball
item.description:
About This Game

Friendly Snowball is a fun multiplayer PVP ball game, to enjoy with friends.

  • Prepare for a slippery battle where you hit frosty balls with your giant hammer to score.
  • Use power ups scattered throughout the arena to help you beat the opponent team.
  • Play with friends and have fun in a snowy environment!

Friendly Snowball is the first physic-based multiplayer game made with Playcraft!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/805270?utm_source=VersusVampireStorePage

item.title: Project Hybrid
item.description:
About This Game



In Project Hybrid, you'll find yourself ensnared, desperately seeking an escape while unraveling the enigma of your surroundings and the mysterious circumstances that brought you here.



Story to uncover

Multiple endings

Escape room like puzzles

Monsters/ human experiments

Video camera

UV light



You find yourself on a boat, and suddenly, you discover that you are confined within a cell. Now, you must unravel the mysteries surrounding your unexpected imprisonment and devise a plan to escape. Uncover the secrets that led to your confinement and understand the reasons behind this perplexing situation.



EPILEPSY WARNING

Warning: Please read before playing this game:

Some individuals may be susceptible to epileptic seizures or loss of consciousness triggered by exposure to certain flashing lights and moving patterns in everyday life. This susceptibility can extend to activities like watching television images or playing specific video games. It is crucial to note that such reactions may occur even in individuals with no prior medical history of epilepsy or seizures.

Precautions:

If you or any member of your family has experienced symptoms related to epilepsy (seizures or loss of consciousness) when exposed to flashing lights or moving patterns, it is strongly advised to consult a doctor before engaging in this game.
Should you or your family experience any symptoms of seizure during gameplay, such as dizziness, nausea, or loss of consciousness, it is imperative to cease playing immediately and seek prompt medical attention.

Safety First:

  • Prioritize your well-being and exercise caution, especially if you have a history of adverse reactions to visual stimuli.

  • Take regular breaks during gameplay to reduce the risk of discomfort or adverse effects.

  • Adjust the game settings to minimize potential triggers, if available.

  • By adhering to these precautions, you can ensure a safer and more enjoyable gaming experience.

item.title: Burrito Bear
item.description:
About This Game



Burritos are raining from the sky - Bear wants to eat them, but colliding with dangerous falling garbage causes serious gas! Before indigestion strikes, Bear needs your help to eat them all!




Burrito Bear is on a never-ending quest for fullness that spans diverse areas and includes fashion-forward accessories for them to mix-and-match while reaching ultra burrito eating euphoria!






  • Eat Burritos - Shove as many delicious burritos into Bear’s mouth as possible!
  • Power Ups - Consume and interact with a wild variety of juiced-up power-ups to aid (or inhibit) Bear in their stinky journey for maximum fullness!
  • Customize Bear - Collect numerous outfits, accessories, and tools to completely deck out Bear; some of which can be used to get and edge up on falling garbage!
  • Traverse Multiple Areas - Using special warp burritos, Bear can fart out massive wormholes to send them across space and time to other lands!
  • Different Modes - Play through three different modes: Story, Arcade, and Endless!
  • Online Leaderboards - Climb the ranks and become Top Bear!
  • Original Soundtrack - Jam out to bunch of funky jams created by D Fast!

item.title: Tenno
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare to unleash the untamed spirit of the ninja within you as you step into the immersive world of "Tenno", a captivating turn-based RPG.
Here, your journey unfolds through the interplay of strength, honed skill, and strategic brilliance, crafting a unique path that leads you towards the coveted status of the ultimate master.
Traverse this captivating realm, honing the ancient arts of combat, stealth, and mysticism, as you ascend the ranks to claim the esteemed title of "Tenno".
Forge alliances, conquer challenges, and delve into the heart of an adventure that will define your legacy as a true master of your craft.

item.title: Cthulhu Must Die
item.description:
About This Game



Invoke the wrath of Cthulhu, and embark on a desperate quest to hunt down and vanquish the ancient cosmic entity before the final ritual seals its invincibility!

Cthulhu Must Die is an action-roguelike infused with investigation and survival elements, where your choices shape your strength and determine your ability to track and confront Cthulhu.

Engage in intense battles against hordes of Cthulhu's minions, while keeping a watchful eye on the ticking clock of the ritual's progression.

Key Features

  • Unearth clues from scattered notes and follow map signs to pinpoint Cthulhu's elusive whereabouts.
  • Engage in fast-paced runs of 20 minutes or less, testing your agility and wit.
  • Masterfully wield manual weapons to aim and shoot with precision, including holy books, scalpels, and an arsenal of upcoming additions.
  • Customize your runs with unique characters (with more on the way) that offer distinct abilities and playstyles.
  • Choose from a wide array of weapons, ranging from sound-based weaponry to forthcoming additions, ensuring varied combat experiences.
  • Discover an abundance of upgrades that grant each run a distinct flavor, with even more enhancements on the horizon.
  • Seamlessly switch between keyboard and gamepad for enhanced control and comfort.



As the world teeters on the brink of damnation, only you possess the power to deliver it from eternal torment. Uncover the secrets, face your fears, and slay Cthulhu before all hope is lost!

item.title: Martyrdom
item.description:
About This Game

A woman is trapped inside the basement and your job is to...

Get the password.



Martyrdom is a psychological horror game, where you torture a person to get the password, using various methods, but nothing seems to be working. You don't have much time as a creature - Alastor - is lurking in the building as well and it's getting closer and closer to you. Explore the unique apartment with surreal puzzles and environment, and get the password.



The surrealism and torture is being combined to achieve unique, dark and creepy story-telling as well as visual environment, with more and more creatures showing up to torture you, as well as offer new gameplay and puzzles.

item.title: Damn it!
item.description:
About This Game

Climb to the top with the help of sticky marshmallows. Try to choose the right path at challenging intersections along the way. A frustrating and fun adventure awaits you.

  • You can throw a web at every object around you like a spider and pull yourself.
  • Approximately 40-∞ minutes of gameplay.
  • Levels that never frustrate.
  • Cute character (optional).

item.title: 50CK3T
item.description:
About This Game

Socket is an indie platform puzzler in the tradition of Unravel, Limbo, and Little Nightmares. If those games are novels, consider Socket a short story that packs an emotional punch. After the death of their only human friend, two tiny androids, Socket and Birdie, must traverse the harsh landscape of Current City, sharing a single failing battery. They must recharge where and when they can, taking on increasingly difficult puzzles along the way. You play as both Socket and Birdie, switching between the two to complete tasks, and combining to conserve battery when you can. Each puzzle is a race against time, as your battery goes from green to yellow to desperate red. Condensed from an award-winning animated screenplay by bestselling author, Scott J. Holliday, Socket is a story of love, sacrifice, and what it means to have a friend. As Socket says, "Hearts break, but batteries die."

Key features:

- Time-based puzzle platforming.
- Two character control - jumping, flying, pushing, pulling, throwing switches, stacking, and recharging.
- Continue from checkpoints.
- A beautiful musical score.
- A heartfelt story of friendship and sacrifice.

item.title: IFU
item.description:
About This Game

Immerse yourself in a world where every step you take could be your last, where the tension grows with every passing moment. The IFU invites you to guide your character, Alexander, through loops of uncharted mysteries and dark secrets.

Discover a story that takes your breath away:.
You are Alexander, a computer programmer who finds himself at the center of an unimaginable nightmare. Your reality turns into a struggle for survival when you follow an invitation that promises to be the gateway to a new life, but becomes the entrance to hell. Meet the mystical Droseries and uncover Dr. Hatcher's story, which is shrouded in sinister secrets.


FEEL THE FEATURE OF THE COUNTRY:.
In IFU, every element of the environment contributes to the frightening atmosphere. From an ominous rustle to the flickering light of a lantern, your heart will beat in rhythm with every step in an abandoned mansion where every corner could be hiding your enemy... or a clue... Or a clue.


EXPERIENCE THE BORDERS OF REALISM:.
IFU raises the bar on realism with thoughtful gameplay that forces you to look at simple walking from a new angle. Discretion and attention to detail are your main allies in the search for the truth.


OPEN the veil of secrets:.
Every item, every document in the IFU is a piece of the puzzle that you must assemble to understand the full picture of the horror taking place. Put them together to uncover stories that are only whispered in the shadows.

item.title: IDLE Animal Anatomy
item.description:
About This Game

Have you ever dreamed of raising an animal with your own hands? Feel like a scientist in this game and grow your favorite pet cage by cage right on your device!

In this game
- a lot of interesting facts about animals
- learn how the internal organs of animals and humans look like
- can you raise cute animals
- plunge into anatomy like a real scientist.Grow all the living creatures from the collection!

item.title: Delicious Donut
item.description:
About This Game

Solve the world most delicious donut puzzle reduced to it's simplest form right here in front of you, ready to be taken to other planets, and spread the words about how delicious these donuts are.

To solve the puzzle, you have to move the donuts to the correct spot just like sokoban puzzle.

WASD move
Z undo
X redo

item.title: 黄毛漂流记
item.description:
About This Game

Player Discussion Group

https://steamcommunity.com/chat/invite/ZdEEZDZi

Main Plot:

Due to a maritime accident, you unexpectedly find yourself on this island and receive a warm invitation to settle here. The village chief enthusiastically introduces you to other residents of the island: Ping, Aunt Lin, the carpenter, and others. Everyone is excited about your arrival. Your mission is to develop the island and embark on a series of exciting explorations.

Gameplay:

Maintain good relationships with NPCs through various distinctive tasks. Each NPC, with their unique personality, has different storylines. In your leisure time, you can earn island currency through mechanisms like fishing, planting, and selling. Use these earnings to purchase more building blueprints for island construction.
You can also take a speedboat from the pier to visit other unique islands, meet more characters, and invite them to join in building the small island.

Character Introductions:

  • Aunt Lin: A kind and gentle housewife who, along with her daughter, runs a martial arts gym for a living.
  • Ping: Aunt Lin's daughter, passionate about martial arts.
  • Xiao Ai: The somewhat laid-back owner of a shop.

item.title: Black Gunner Wukong
item.description:
About This Game

Black Gunner Wukong is a Rougelike type shooting game.
In the game, the player takes on the role of Wukong , who enters a U.S. military base to rescue his master who has been captured by Diden.
In the game, all creatures are identified as armed helicopters and supermarket shopping bags, not as female and male!
Demo:https://store.steampowered.com/app/2095890/

Game Features:


A very rare TPS+Vampire survivor!
Can use 6 big guns to crush your enemies!
Can fly using the Nimbus Cloud!
Rich build options, gun bonds combinations.
Play as different forms of Wukong, with various active and passive skills.
Bullet storms, a true bullet hell!
Collect peaches from each round of battle, purchase enhancements, and ultimately engage in a showdown with the boss.
A comically themed background storyline.

item.title: YouTuber Survivors
item.description:
About This Game

Story

A super popular fitness YouTuber with over 5 million subscribers... The protagonist, Beom-
tae, is happily running a YouTube channel, receiving tremendous love from fans.

Can it be this intense?!! This is... dangerous!!

Survive from the fans...!


Youtuber Survivors is a BEAT 'EM UP + Rogue-like action game. A unique "One button combo system" makes complex technical movements in a breeze.

Key features:


  • 2D BEAT 'EM UP + Rogue-like!
  • A cartoon-like story filled with humor!
  • Easy One button combo system!
  • Unlock permanent trait for your character!

item.title: Detective Ridelle
item.description:
About This Game

Solve the Clues. Unravel the Mystery.


Ridelle receives an anonymous letter inviting her on a luxury train. On board, she's already suspicious - but when someone is found dead it's up to her to catch the killer.

Detective Ridelle is a first-person puzzle game with visual novel style storytelling.

Explore a unique, handcrafted world filled with suspects, clues, and hidden secrets.
Can you uncover the truth and bring the killer to justice?

On board you will find:


  • Escape Room Puzzles
    Featuring unique puzzles by a real escape room designer. You'll need to keep your wits about you to solve them all.
  • A Cast of Crazy Characters
    Why are all these people on the train? Where were they at the time of the murder?
    Why does everyone seem to have something to hide?
    It's up to you to find out.
  • Unique Handcrafted Environments
    Enjoy uncovering and exploring the many locations handcrafted with a unique visual style.
  • A Thrilling Mystery
    There's a murderer on board and you're the only one who can stop them. Unravel the web of clues to find the killer before it's too late.

item.title: 消失的妹妹(The Vanished Sister)
item.description:
About This Game

Developed independently by a Bilibili horror game anchor for two and a half years

Background story:

My younger sister mysteriously disappeared, and the protagonist followed her trail to a mysterious sea building. As night fell, the terrifying secrets buried here gradually became apparent.

Gameplay:

In this game, players need to avoid the capture of "spiritual bodies" that may be hidden in any corner, stimulate all intelligence, and use various props found along the way to find ways to escape. Even the most tenacious players must give their all in harsh environments, do their best to survive, and escape into the sky.

Game features:

-Typical design of traditional horror escape games
-Innovatively adding an emotional system to artificial intelligence, accumulating anger points while chasing players. With each stage of anger, AI's various abilities will be improved to varying degrees
-Carefully building advanced artificial intelligence systems
-All props are randomly generated, with multiple escape methods and a permanent death mechanism, providing a brand new experience in each game
-The game is divided into multiple levels of difficulty, each with its own unique design

item.title: Defense Contract
item.description:
About This Game

Grapple hook racing


Speed through challenging race levels using grappling hooks in VR. Defense Contract is built for virtual reality and provides a unique and exciting experience aimed at VR veterans but still enjoyable to those without their "VR legs" for short periods.

Defense Contract will appeal to players looking for more intense, fast paced VR content. While it does contain a level editor that is surprisingly fun and low-key, the majority of the content is exhilarating, superhero-feeling racing game play.

Current features

  • Grapple hook racing
  • Over 20 built in levels (with more being added)
  • Fully VR level editor for creating your own challenges

item.title: Abyssmare
item.description:
About This Game

Abyssmare is a near future science fiction world view based on the Cthulhu Mythos world view, and an action game based on Roguelite+first person shooting.

gameplay：

1.Old-School FPS
With ultra-high movement speed and sustainable output of powerful firepower, all you need to do is attack and explode all the living creatures.
Your goal is to explore the dungeon and find the elevator that leads to the lower level. During this process, you can search for resources in the maze to strengthen yourself, such as ammunition, medical kits, energy crystals, and various weapons and equipment.


2.Manual random maze
On the surface, it is a randomly generated maze, but in reality, all changes in the maze are artificially designed.
This game aims to achieve randomness while ensuring a maze exploration experience.


3.Weapons and Equipments
More than 30 completely different firearms.
More than 20 sub weapons with different functions.
Each profession has a melee weapon.
More than 40 different equipment components, each with unique functions and effects.
The quantity of these items will continue to be updated.
I hope this can enhance your enjoyment of exploring the maze.


4.Roguelite game
This game has two growth cycles.
Growth in a single adventure: includes acquiring weapons and equipment, improving personal attributes, obtaining random buffs, and shopping in temporary stores.
Growth through multiple adventures: The protagonist can obtain a certain amount of resources for each adventure, regardless of victory or death. After completing a single adventure, they can consume resources and permanently enhance the character's strength.

5.Action-RPG game
This game has certain RPG elements, such as custom characters, equipment, and random entries on equipment, character professions, character attributes, etc.


6.Enemies
16 regular enemies+10 bosses, and will continue to be updated.
Except for human enemies, they are all based on the classic Cthulhu Mythos series novels.

Cthulhu Mythos elements:

In this game, monsters and old dominators in the Cthulhu Mythos, whose size is approximately similar to that of human beings and may be destroyed by human weapons, are selected as enemies, and a new image is designed for them.
Most enemies have undergone physical modifications and are wearing "ShenWei" exoskeletons, hoping these will make you feel interesting.

item.title: Jousting in January
item.description:
About This Game

Jousting in January is a g̶̶̶o̶̶̶o̶̶̶f̶̶̶y̶̶̶ ̶̶̶s̶̶̶i̶̶̶d̶̶̶e̶̶̶ ̶̶̶p̶̶̶r̶̶̶o̶̶̶j̶̶̶e̶̶̶c̶̶̶t̶̶̶ ̶̶̶I̶̶̶ ̶̶̶t̶̶̶h̶̶̶r̶̶̶e̶̶̶w̶̶̶ ̶̶̶t̶̶̶o̶̶̶g̶̶̶e̶̶̶t̶̶̶h̶̶̶e̶̶̶r̶̶̶ ̶̶̶t̶o̶ ̶e̶n̶t̶e̶r̶t̶a̶i̶n̶ ̶m̶y̶s̶e̶l̶f̶ ̶̶̶s̶̶̶i̶̶̶n̶̶̶c̶̶̶e̶̶̶ ̶̶̶m̶̶̶y̶̶̶ ̶̶̶m̶̶̶a̶̶̶i̶̶̶n̶̶̶ ̶̶̶p̶̶̶r̶̶̶o̶̶̶j̶̶̶e̶̶̶c̶̶̶t̶̶̶ ̶̶̶h̶̶̶a̶̶̶s̶̶̶ ̶̶̶h̶̶̶i̶̶̶t̶̶̶ ̶̶̶s̶̶̶o̶̶̶m̶̶̶e̶̶̶ ̶̶̶d̶̶̶e̶̶̶l̶̶̶a̶̶̶y̶̶̶s̶̶̶ free for all arcade game in which you must strike the enemy before they get you. 1 hit kill. 1st hit wins. Game features include:

- 8 levels randomly selected at the start of each round
- 2+ players in local multiplayer
- An easy access Quit Game button so you can go run conveniently timed errands before your friends catch up to your score
- Melee weapon that can be thrown as a projectile (or left on the ground like a spike trap in one of those dimly lit parts of the map)
- Movement in 8 directions

P.S. You will be unarmed after throwing your lance. You'll have to go pick it up or lead the enemies to your lance sitting on the ground.

item.title: Wolf The Lone Hunt
item.description:
About This Game

Wolf The Lone Hunt is a small indie adventure game in which you explore, hunt wild animals to gain experience, level up your wolf, and even gain the ability to transform into a powerful werewolf. Fight strong bosses and emerge as an apex predator of the island.

  • Explore a vast island with mysterious caves, ruins and more.
  • Hunt forest wildlife to grow stronger.
  • Level up and gain the ability to transform into a werewolf.
  • Defeat bosses.

item.title: SE VR World Demo
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a playable technology showcase that introduces game mechanics, in this VR project. This game (technology showcase) will serve as the basis of the VR game system for separate new game.
Game will be adventure game with a story, only single player.
A lot of game stuff like models, textures, sounds are from original game Space Engineers.

Player will playing with 2 characters alternately, one as Engineer and second as Policeman on space station.

The Engineer will mainly manually repair various devices. The Policeman will assist the Engineer and have weapons available to protect them from infected Engineers.



This technology showcase is created on Unreal Engine 4.

Compatibility of VR head sets: I'm doing it on Oculus Rift but it's also compatible with Vive (teleport).

Movement: In technology showcase is teleport and free movement. Free movement is still WIP. On Vive can be problem with free movement.

This technology showcase is still WIP.


Music in Bar map is from: www.bensound.com



Original Space Engineers game


Many thanks to Remethep & The Tiamat Gaming Community for support of realization the final release phase.

item.title: Wizard War Online
item.description:
About This Game

Wizard War Online has a P2P connection model. Each player sets up a room or enters one of the rooms. If the room owner wishes, he can kick the players out of the room. When everyone presses the ready button, the room owner can start the game.
Players can increase their levels by killing creatures or other players in the game.
Players start the game on a safe map to level up before entering the battlefield. When they are ready, they are teleported to the battlefield and can start experiencing PVP.
Of course, there are surprises for the approaching enemies at the battlefield starting points :)
Improve your tactics, adjust your timing well and take your place on the leaderboard!

item.title: EXIT KUN
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a game of finding differences and observing. Our game challenges players to carefully observe and spot the distinctions that lead them to the elusive "Exit KUN."

Game Overview:

You find yourself trapped in an enigmatic underground labyrinth, and your only goal is to reach "Exit KUN." The journey demands keen observation of your surroundings. Every detail matters, and anomalies could be your key to progress.

Key Features:

Observe Carefully: Scrutinize your surroundings to uncover anomalies that may guide your way or pose a threat.
Turn Back if Needed: If anomalies are detected, swift decision-making is crucial. Turn back immediately to avoid unforeseen consequences.
Forward Momentum: Should your observation reveal no anomalies, press forward.


Developer Notes:
This game is inspired by Exit 8. You are free to create, upload, and monetize videos and other content featuring Game on platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, and other video-sharing websites. The characters, places, and elements involved in the game are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or events is purely coincidental.

item.title: Home Path
item.description:
About This Game

Home Path is a rogue-like Game where you have to help the Slime to Reach her Home. You have to survive 10 floors and help the little girl to not be hungry.



Get Random power-ups when you travel to the next Floor.



The floors are randomly generated so every playthrough has a new layout.

item.title: Star Lone Wolf
item.description:
About This Game

To learn more about 'Interstellar Lone Wolf' and its game information and benefits, join the official QQ group: 219926703.

Craft Your Own Genre

Spaceships, modules, talents, and items come together to create this world of endless possibilities. The spaceship determines the foundation, modules define the framework, and items flesh it out. Talents empower your genre to take shape smoothly. You'll need to combine your own genre by choosing the ship model, equipped talents, purchased items, and upgrading different modules.

Battle

In 'Interstellar Lone Wolf,' your spaceship will automatically search for and engage enemies in combat. Your primary task is to evade enemy collisions and incoming fire. Upon defeating enemies, they will drop crystals, which you can collect to gain experience points. When your experience bar is full, random module upgrade options will appear. Upgrading different modules will yield vastly different effects, and these upgrades shape the framework of your genre.

Side Quests

To embark on side quests in 'Interstellar Lone Wolf,' you must become familiar with the map and follow the building indicators at the screen's edges to locate your desired destinations. By visiting various buildings, you can accept different side quests and complete them to earn gold coins, which are crucial for your path to victory.

Gold Factory and Crystal Factory

For experienced players, it's essential to learn how to utilize your existing economy to secure future economic growth opportunities. Within the game, you'll encounter two buildings, the 'Gold Factory' and the 'Crystal Factory.' The Gold Factory periodically provides players with gold coins, with production capacity increasing with each upgrade. Similarly, the Crystal Factory periodically supplies crystals, and its production capacity also increases with each upgrade. Each factory can be upgraded to a maximum level of 10. Players must make strategic decisions based on their predictions for the game's progression, determining which factory to upgrade and to what level.

Main Quests

Your main objective in 'Interstellar Lone Wolf' is to defeat four Bosses, and the only way to achieve this is by empowering yourself through all the elements discussed above. If your genre isn't well-constructed or you're not earning money quickly enough, progressing through the later stages can become extremely challenging.

主线任务

击杀四个Boss是您的主线任务，通过上述所有内容，强大自己，是通关的唯一方法。如果流派搭建的不够完善，或者钱赚的不够快，就很难通过后续关卡。

GameOver and GameWin

When you first enter the game, you'll typically face challenges and might fall in battle as early as the second Boss. If you have gaming experience, even the third Boss can pose a significant challenge. Don't worry, whether you win or lose, the game features an evaluation system that assesses your performance and grants you corresponding experience points. Each time you level up, you will randomly receive a talent or unlock a new spaceship. The number of talents you can carry into battle is limited, so you'll need to choose them wisely based on your strategy. Players will gain an additional talent slot at levels 1, 4, and 7, and then every 10 levels thereafter, up to a maximum level of 100.

Challenge

Once you've crafted your own genre and successfully defeated all four Bosses, you can attempt to take on even higher difficulties. The game offers 26 difficulty levels, labeled from A to Z, and it's recommended to start with the lower difficulty levels before progressing to the higher ones. Difficulties can be stacked, allowing you to challenge multiple levels simultaneously. Each selected difficulty level adds a 20% bonus to the final experience earned. If you choose all 26 difficulties, you'll face a monumental challenge that might even turn your previous gaming experiences upside down. The specifics are left for you to explore, and we wish you the best of luck in your endeavors.

Module Synthesis

When specific modules reach their corresponding levels, new modules will become available for synthesis. You can check the specific synthesis formulas by clicking the 'Synthesis' button on the pause menu. Module synthesis can even lead to a profound transformation of your genre, but the details are left for you to explore on your own.

item.title: Frog Story : The Power Tongue
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a captivating adventure with a small frog and its powerful tongue, on a quest to gather scattered fireflies and, crucially, seal the shadows of the Dark Toad King. Navigate through a delightful puzzle-platformer world, mastering pushing and jumping mechanics across 96 intricately designed levels.

Explore the lush Green Marsh, venture into the abandoned Quarry, traverse the icy Watershed, and unravel the secrets within the fortress of the enigmatic Dark Toad King. Each location presents its own challenges and puzzles, adding layers of depth to your quest. Learn new and exciting gameplay elements, and face increasing challenges.

item.title: Soak & Splash
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the Soak & Splash! Get ready to sweat, socialize, and have a blast with your friends in this unique game that combines the best of traditional sauna culture with modern party fun.

First, step into the steamy sauna and feel the heat and humidity envelop your body.

Once everyone is inside, it's time to start the fun. You can start by whisking each other with broom.

Feeling competitive? You can also fight with other players with sauna equipment. Or you can simply relax and enjoy the company of your friends, chatting, singing, or telling jokes.

Finally, when you've had enough of the sauna, you can cool off in the nearby pool or shower.

Overall, this game is all about having fun, bonding with your friends, and experiencing the unique benefits of sauna culture. So why wait? Download game and get ready to sweat, laugh, and enjoy life to the fullest!

item.title: Shop Legends
item.description:
About This Game

Pick up where your adventures left off and embark on a journey of legends...

Upon your graduation from the most prestigious shopkeeping academy, you received an invitation from your uncle’s best friend, Jacque. Your uncle has mysteriously vanished, leaving the once most renowned shop unattended. Now, it’s time for you to step up and inherit this shop by applying your business acumen to reclaim the shops' status as the most preeminent across the lands. Do you have what it takes to go from zero to hero?

Immerse yourself in an Idle Simulation Tycoon RPG like no other, where you are tasked with simultaneously expanding a profitable item shop, crafting legendary equipment to gear up visiting customers as well as commanding mighty heroes you've recruited to loot rare artifacts & blueprints to challenge the top ranked shopkeepers!

~~~~~~~~~
BECOME A MASTER SHOPKEEPER
~~~~~~~~~
◆ CREATE and DESIGN your fantasy item shop with endless possibilities
◆ CRAFT and FUSE powerful items to sell to visiting adventurers
◆ TRADE with other shopkeepers to build your fame and wealth
◆ CUSTOMIZE your shopkeeper avatar to express your own style

~~~~~~~~~
EXPERIENCE AN EXCITING ADVENTURE
~~~~~~~~~
◆ RECRUIT and equip mighty heroes, each with their own unique abilities
◆ COLLECT epic loot across time limited dungeons and themed events
◆ TEAM UP with your friends or make new ones to build a prosperous city
◆ BATTLE bosses and slay titans together to amass fame and fortune

What are you waiting for? All of these adventures and more awaits you–join the millions of players that have already made Shop Legends their home. Prepare yourself for endless adventure as Aragonia anticipates your awakening!
